item.title: Micah Wright: Not a Ranger
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Newsarama has an article on Micah Ian Wright's admittance to never being an Army Ranger, whole lot of back and forth arguing about this one in the message boards following the article. I didn't even know he claimed to be a Ranger. I can see how this can rile people up because of his politically tinged writing and it doesn't help his credibility all that much, but at least he admitted it. Also a bunch of rumbling about it at Pulse. Can I have Stormwatch back now?
